channel.title: 317 thieveing stalls
channel.description:
ok. i just recently had a stupid friend or my co-coder -.- ask me to do him a favor...
"can you make me a thieveing stall, but insted of recieveing money, make it spawn fish, and give you a level in fishing? kinda like godzhell's box's that give you firemakeing xp???"
-.- so i spint 20 minutes on it adding a fishing stall and alllllll this bull ****...
idk how to make the code thingy on here sorry guys...
case 4277: TheifStall("fish stall", "and recieve 1 raw shark", 1, 250 * playerLevel[10], 383, 1, 5, 0x340); break;
is what i made... 4277 = fishing stall. 1=level required. 250 = xp? i changed [17 to 10 because 10 = fishing?] 383 = raw shark. 1 = ammount you get.
only one problem... i get thieve xp... insted of fishing xp... can someone change that code to fix it where i get fishing xp insted of thieveing...? please? would be alot of help... anyway thanks guys!

item.title: 317 thieveing stalls
item.dc:creator: @calebsomthing calebsomthing
item.description:
@calebsomthing wrote:

ddrag. i love u. -hug- lol. nohomo. but thanks man. “u gave me what i needed to find out how to do this” sadly the client u have must be diffrent from mine >.> but i changed a bit of stuff on mine. cause i seen what u were saying. ^^ Fishstall FTW. lol thanks man. idk how to rep++ but i would if i knew how >w< tytytytytytyty.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 thieveing stalls
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

Change from this

public void TheifStall(String stallName, String message, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int item, int itemAmount, int emote) {
if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction < actionInterval) return;
 if(playerLevel[17] >= lvlReq) {
   actionInterval = 4000;
   lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
   setAnimation(emote);
   sM("You take from the stall..");
   sM(message);
   addItem(item, itemAmount);
   addSkillXP(XPamount, 17);
  }
  else if(playerLevel[17] < lvlReq) {
  sM("You need a theiving level of "+lvlReq+" to theif from this stall.");
 }
}

Change to

public void TheifStall(String stallName, String message, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int item, int itemAmount, int emote) {
if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction < actionInterval) return;
 if(playerLevel[playerFishing] >= lvlReq) {
   actionInterval = 4000;
   lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
   setAnimation(emote);
   sM("You get a catch..");
   sM(message);
   addItem(item, itemAmount);
   addSkillXP(XPamount, playerFishing);
  }
  else if(playerLevel[playerFishing] < lvlReq) {
  sM("You need a Fishing level level of "+lvlReq+" to catch anything from this.");
 }
}

But i would also change

public void TheifStall(String stallName, String message, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int item, int itemAmount, int emote) 
{

to something like this

public void startFishing(String stallName, String message, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int item, int itemAmount, int emote) {

so could new code you would be adding would look something like this

public void startFishing(String stallName, String message, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int item, int itemAmount, int emote) {
if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction < actionInterval) return;
 if(playerLevel[playerFishing] >= lvlReq) {
   actionInterval = 4000;
   lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
   setAnimation(emote);
   sM("You get a catch..");
   sM(message);
   addItem(item, itemAmount);
   addSkillXP(XPamount, playerFishing);
  }
  else if(playerLevel[playerFishing] < lvlReq) {
  sM("You need a Fishing level level of "+lvlReq+" to catch anything from this.");
 }
}

Read full topic

item.title: 317 thieveing stalls
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

250 * playerLevel[10] is the total experience you will receive in thieving. The TheifStall method give you thieving experience, so if you want fishing experience you will need to rewrite the method.

Read full topic

5 is the theiving xp change it to 10
